DOC.brief_title: Obtaining Storing Wound Debridment Samples For Immediate Future Wound-Related Scientific Study
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria 1 . The subject must full thickness wound . 2 . The subject must candidate sharp debridement . 3 . The subject must 18 year age old 4 . The subject must mentally competent determined Principal Investigator . Exclusion Criteria 1 . The subject may currently incarcerate pregnant . - Nursing home hospitalize subject exclude study subject represent large part wound population .
